select.all: SELECT U.id, kid, server, genics, userkey, name, DATE_FORMAT( updateDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as updateDate, company FROM USER AS U INNER JOIN LOGINUSER AS L ON U.AUTHORID = L.ID;

update.date: UPDATE USERS SET updateDate = ? WHERE kid = ?
update.accout_number: UPDATE USERS SET account_number = ? WHERE kid = ?
